histogram.name: ContextualCueing.GlicSuggestions.FocusedTabEligibleForSuggestions
histogram.summary: Recorded every time a request for suggestions for focused tab is requested. Records whether the page type of the focused tab is eligible for contextual suggestions.

histogram.name: ContextualCueing.GlicSuggestions.MesFetchLatency
histogram.summary: Recorded every time a suggestion response is received from Model Execution Service. Records the amount of time it takes to receive the response, from when the corresponding suggestion request is sent.

histogram.name: ContextualCueing.GlicSuggestions.PageContextFetchlatency.{PageContextType}
histogram.summary: Recorded every time a page context extraction is completed. Records the time it takes from the beginning of a context fetch to when the results are received. The results are split by page context types (e.g. InnerText vs. AnnotatedPageContent).

variant.name: AnnotatedPageContent
variant.summary: Page context in the form of annotated page content

variant.name: InnerText
variant.summary: Page context in the form of page inner text.

variant.name: Total
variant.summary: All page contexts that are related to one zero state suggestions fetch.

histogram.name: ContextualCueing.GlicSuggestions.PinnedTabsEligibleForSuggestions
histogram.summary: Recorded every time a request for suggestions for pinned tabs is requested. Records whether the request is eligible for contextual suggestions based on the page types of all pinned tabs.

histogram.name: ContextualCueing.GlicSuggestions.SuggestionsFetchLatency.{ResultType}{EngagementType}
histogram.summary: Recorded every time something is returned as a result of invoking the suggestions fetch API. The results are split by the type of results returned (e.g. results with no suggestions vs results with valid suggestions) and engagement type (FRE v reengagement).

variant.name: EmptySuggestions
variant.summary: When no suggestions are returned as a result of a suggestions fetch

variant.name: ValidSuggestions
variant.summary: When valid suggestions are returned as a result of a suggestions fetch

variant.name: .FRE
variant.summary: When suggestions are fetched for the FRE

variant.name: .Reengagement
variant.summary: When suggestions are fetched for reengagement

histogram.name: ContextualCueing.NudgeDecision.{ContextualCueingOptimizationType}
histogram.summary: The nudge decision for {ContextualCueingOptimizationType}. Recorded once per page load when the document has loaded.

histogram.name: ContextualCueing.NudgeInteraction
histogram.summary: The user interaction for a Contextual Cueing Nudge. Recorded when a user is shown or interacts with a contextual nudge.
